title: CMO Amethi Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 17 Medical Officer Posts
description: The Chief Medical Officer, Amethi (CMO Amethi) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 17 Medical Officers, General Physician Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the CMO Amethi Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process...
